<p><span>Halloween’s almost here and even we’re not immune from pumpkinmania. Enter our KSPumpkin contest, like Pawel here and you may win a small treat! Click <a href="http://bit.ly/1wl4alz"><strong>HERE</strong></a> to find out how to enter.</span></p>
Awesome! I'm tempted to try and make my own... probably a Kraken if I did.
